summary: A companion mod that places thirty companions in taverns, meaderies, and inns throughout Skyrim. These companions use Apachii Hair and the Bethesda companion system and will follow, wait, trade, do favors, and marry just like default companions.
descriptionHtml:
CM Beautiful Companions
========================

A companion mod that places thirty companions in taverns, meaderies, and 
inns throughout Skyrim. These companions use Apachii Hair and the Bethesda 
companion system and will follow, wait, trade, do favors, and marry just 
like default companions.  Other features include:

1. CM Beautiful Companions include male and female, a variety of combat 
classes, and at least two of every race.  See the CM Beautiful Companions 
guide below for a complete rundown of races, classes, and locations.

2. The mod has been created with Skyrim Patch v.1.6, and v.1.5 corrected the 
face tint bug so that an *.esm file is no longer necessary.  

3. CM Beautiful Companions will stay at the current location in sandbox mode 
when told it\'s time to part ways so they can be left in any house, tavern, 
inn, etc.  They will not return to their starting locations.   
 
4. All weapons, armor and clothing can now be accessed, removed, and traded 
with companions.  Companions will wear casual clothing when on their own in 
sandbox mode.  When you ask them to follow you, open their inventories, and 
give them something, and they will don the best armor, mage robes, or 
enchanted clothing they have in their inventories.  Or you can just lead 
through a door and they will automatically don their best armor when the new 
cell loads.

5. All CM Beautiful Companions have been given spells, powers, abilities, 
and perks to compliment their classes.     

6. CM Beautiful Companions are all essential.  A nonessential version has 
been posted for download under Optional Files.  

8. Complete step-by-step instructions have been included to explain in 
detail how anyone can create their own custom companion mod and upload to 
share with others.  


CM Beautiful Companions Guide
==============================

1.  Ai - F, Argonian Rogue, Ivarstead Inn
2.  Argon - M, Argonian Warrior 1H, Honningbrew Meadery
3.  Ari - M, Redguard Barbarian, Ivarstead Inn
4.  Ariel - F, Nord Thief, Riften Ragged Flagon
5.  Athereal - F, Wood Elf Ranger, Riverwood Inn
6.  Beth - F, Imperial Rogue DW, Falkreath Inn
7.  Cam - M, Dark Elf Fire Mage, Dawnstar Inn
8.  Crunch - M, Orc Barbarian, Kynesgrove Inn
9.  Drake - M, Breton Lightning Mage, Riverwood Inn
10. Draya - F, Dark Elf Spellsword, Windhelm New Gnisis Club
11. Hawk - M, Wood Elf Scout, Dragonbridge Inn
12. Hunter - M, Nord Scout, Whiterun Bannered Mare
13. Jaz - F, Khajiit Spellsword, Old Hroldan Inn
14. Kali - M, Khajiit Warrior 1H, Nightgate Inn
15. Kate - F, Breton Conjurer, Rorikstead Inn
16. Kristen - F, Nord Ranger, Winterhold Inn
17. Lane - M, High Elf Frost Mage, Riften Inn
18. Leigh - F, Nord Warrior 2H, Winterhold Inn
19. Lily - F, Breton Fire Mage, Morthal Inn
20. Luna - F, Redguard Thief, Riften Inn
21. Megan - F, Imperial Conjurer, Whiterun Drunken Huntsman
22. Mila - F, Wood Elf Ranger, Honnington Meadery
23, Nora - F, Nord Spellsword, Markarth Inn
24. Rendar - M, Breton Battlemage, Dawnstar Inn
25. Ryder - M, Imperial Warrior 1H, Solitude Inn
26. Shasha - F, Orc Warrior 1H, Kynesgrove Inn
27. Sienna - F, Imperial Battlemage, Whiterun Bannered Mare
28. Sierra - F, High Elf Fire Mage, Solitude Inn
29. Strider - M, Nord Ranger, Falkreth Inn
30. Swen - M, Nord Battlemage, Windhelm Candlehearth Inn


Recommended Mods
================

For a better companion experience: 

- Ask Follower Skills - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?
id=10675
- Mounted Followers - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?
id=12175
- Multiple Followers - http://forums.bethsoft.com/topic/1345602-wiprel-
multiple-followers/
- Face, Hair, and Eye mods of your choice
- Calientes Female Body Mod Big Bottom Edition (CBBE) - 

http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=2666
- KillerKeos Skimpy CBBE Armor Sets - 
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=3654

Compatibility with Companion Overhaul Mods:
Compatible but only one of them at a time. Follow overhaul mod compatibility 

instructions.
- Big Dialogue Overhaul
- Ultimate Follower Overhaul
- Better Followers
- Amazing Follower Tweaks
- Extensible Follower Framework

For Better RPG:

- Live Another Life - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=9557
- Portable camping gear mod of your choice.


Installation Requirements:
==================================================

Official Skyrim patch 1.6 or greater required.
Apachii Hair required - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10168
Download and install by one of the following methods. 

Installation - Nexus Mod Manager
================================

Use the \"Download with Manager\" button on the CM Beautiful Companions Mod 
page at Skyrim Nexus and activate after download. 


Installation - Wrye Bash BAIN
=============================

Drop the CMBeautifulCompanions.esp into your Skyrim Mods\\Bash Installers 
folder, and then activate.


Installation - Manual
=====================

Drop the CMBeautifulCompanions.esp and graphics folders into your Data 
folder.  
Activate the mod using a mod manager prior to playing Skyrim. 


Uninstall
=========

If you used a mod management program, use it to uninstall. Otherwise delete 
CMBeautifulCompanions.esp and graphics facegendata files from the Data 
folder.  


Load Order
==========

Load order will not make any difference.


Incompatible Mods
=================

Any mods that alter the Bethesda default companion dialogue and scripting 
may affect CM Beautiful Companions depending on what has been changed.  


Known Issues
============

None.


Sources
=======

The Creation Kit Wiki Tutorials - 
http://www.creationkit.com/Category:Tutorials

The Creation Kit - Steam download listed under Tools.

TESVSnip - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=5064


Licensing and Legal
===================

The CM Beautiful Companions Mod was created by Cutthroat Mods and is 
furnished as is without promises or guarantees to be bug free or conflict 
free.  The mod uses the default companion system and any bugs inherent to 
the game or caused by other mods that alter the default companion system are 
not the responsibility of Cutthroat Mods.  

Do not upload this mod to any website without permission from Cutthroat 
Mods.  Translations into other languages are permitted  provided this Readme 
is included as is in English along with any translated versions.  Translated 
files can be uploaded to any  website except Steam Workshop.  Permissions to 
do translations are not required.  If you have any questions or concerns 
please  send email to cutthroatmods@hotmail.com.  


Revision History
================

Version 1.1 - Fixed voices for Female Beast Races and bug in Nonessential 
leveling. 

Version 1.0 - Initial release.
author: Cutthroat Mods
